title: Stade Alberic Richards
text: Stade Alberic Richards is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Sandy%20Ground%2C%20Saint%20Martin">Sandy Ground, Saint Martin</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The stadium holds 2,600 people. The stadium is located on the French side of the island.
